DOC.brief_summary: Once participant recruit , grip strength shall test complete baseline questionnaire assess functional status symptom severity . Following recruitment stage , participant ask attend Medway Maritime Hospital week four week , receive massage protocol . At first session participant shall ask rate pain ( NPRS ) , receive massage treatment . This follow instruction perform self-massage , ask complete daily four-week period , record diary . At remain three session , participant shall complete NPRS prior receive massage treatment . After four week group reassess Orthopaedic Clinic attend prior recruitment . They ask complete final pain score , record change condition , repeat initial symptom questionnaire , finally preform grip strength test . The duration four week choose time-frame within specific massage protocol advise 'significant symptom improvement ' see .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Massage Therapy Treatment Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 year . Pain paraesthesia and/or hypoesthesia hand , area innervate median nerve . Participants must clinical diagnosis Carpal Tunnel Syndrome ( CTS ) . Participant must able comply study procedure . Participant must attend Medway Maritime Hospital ( Kent ) , assessment present condition . Participant willing able give inform consent participation study . Participant must contraindicate receipt massage . Participants must able speak read English fluently . Participants receive additional treatment carpal tunnel pain part standard care ( topical pain relief , brace ) . Participants surgery anatomical site relevant condition and/or treatment ( neck , shoulder , arm , wrist , hand ) . Participants suggestion additional condition relate carpal tunnel pain ( i.e . previous trauma , pregnancy , etc ) . Planning undertake activity lifestyle change may affect level carpal tunnel pain ( e.g . changing/ceasing occupation , alternative symptom therapy , adopting/ceasing hobby ) .
